title: Reconciliation, Referendum and Mabo
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
abstract: A selection of films to celebrate the anniversaries of the 1967 Referendum and the Mabo decision, during Reconciliation Week.
description: A significant week for indigenous and non-indigenous Australians with the anniversary of the 1967 Referendum, Reconciliation Week and the anniversary of the Mabo decision all occuring within the week.
member_object: Title; 314494; The Fair go: winning the 1967 referendum; Active; 1999
